abstract: Andy Webster reviews musical Here I Sit, Broken Hearted... A Bathroom Odyssey, written and directed by Seth Panitch and featuring music by R Johnson Hall, at Samuel Beckett Theater; Matt Lewis, Chip Persons, Ian Anderson and Panitch star.

headline.print_headline: The Call of Nature, and Walls of Graffiti
headline.main: Review: ‘Here I Sit, Broken Hearted,’ Answering Nature’s Call With Bathroom Humor

keywords.value: Here I Sit, Broken Hearted...A Bathroom Odyssey (Play)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: Seth Panitch’s play, an hourlong exercise in puerile scatology, is built around men’s room graffiti, sight gags and comic riffs.
lead_paragraph: Seth Panitch’s play, an hourlong exercise in puerile scatology, is built around men’s room graffiti, sight gags and comic riffs.
